title: Kroger
summary: Save with Kroger! Coupons, ads, rewards, find stores & shopping list in one app!
description: Looking for a faster, easier, more rewarding shopping experience? Save time and money with the Kroger app! It puts convenience, savings and rewards at your fingertips. Simply download the app, create an account and register your Kroger Shopper’s Card to access all these great benefits:- Shop ClickList® curbside pickup or delivery right from the app!- Easily build your online shopping list, and use it to shop in-store or to place your ClickList® order.- View your Weekly Ads and quickly add sale items or specials to your shopping list.- Load digital coupons directly to your Shopper’s Card and use them to save on items from your shopping list.- Get even more savings when you choose items from our Smart Suggest feature.- Refill your Kroger Pharmacy prescriptions directly from your phone or tablet. Just type in your prescription number, select your Pharmacy and schedule a convenient pickup time.- Check your fuel points.- Use our locator to find the closest Kroger store or fuel center.- View your purchase history. Use it to create standard orders that will save you time.- Save BIG with exclusive promotions, personalized offers and bonus rewards.To use the Kroger app, you'll need a Kroger digital account. You can register for your account and link your Shopper’s Card through the app. If you don't have a Shopper’s Card, you can create one when you register to access all of these savings and rewards!
descriptionHTML:
Looking for a faster, easier, more rewarding shopping experience? Save time and money with the Kroger app! It puts convenience, savings and rewards at your fingertips. Simply download the app, create an account and register your Kroger Shopper’s Card to access all these great benefits:

- Shop ClickList® curbside pickup or delivery right from the app!

- Easily build your online shopping list, and use it to shop in-store or to place your ClickList® order.

- View your Weekly Ads and quickly add sale items or specials to your shopping list.

- Load digital coupons directly to your Shopper’s Card and use them to save on items from your shopping list.

- Get even more savings when you choose items from our Smart Suggest feature.

- Refill your Kroger Pharmacy prescriptions directly from your phone or tablet. Just type in your prescription number, select your Pharmacy and schedule a convenient pickup time.

- Check your fuel points.

- Use our locator to find the closest Kroger store or fuel center.

- View your purchase history. Use it to create standard orders that will save you time.

- Save BIG with exclusive promotions, personalized offers and bonus rewards.

To use the Kroger app, you'll need a Kroger digital account. You can register for your account and link your Shopper’s Card through the app. If you don't have a Shopper’s Card, you can create one when you register to access all of these savings and rewards!
comments: Thank you Kroger! I have been having issues with this app for a few weeks and have updated it several times with nothing fixed. I just updated the app and it's working beautifully! Love the app with the coupons and fuel points! Please chill out on the clock list promos, there isn't a Kroger that offers it within 50 miles of me so I couldn't care less. Thanks!

Love the app & sure saves me money! Food,gift cards, clothing & gas savings are awesome. Would give it 5 stars but can not use Wi-Fi at local store as my security tells me it is unsafe. Even employees tell me they can not use for same reason? Duh please fix for 5 stars & a big Thank You!

I love the Kroger app. I can download coupons so easily, and I can browse the weekly ad. Those are the main features I use, but it does a lot more. You can make grocery lists and order on Clicklist too. My one complaint is that one of the recent updates has caused the weekly ads to be cut off on the bottom. You can't see the bottom edge of the ad at all.

The previous version I had worked good. I just updated at Google's suggestion and this version is lousy. It's slow. Takes several seconds for the page to change. It sometimes crashes. I wish I could go back to the previous version.

Technical difficulties ... Technical difficulties ... Loved this app before the latest update broke it! Now it's useless! Another update and still can't clip coupons. Missed another free Friday coupon.

I adore this app. I'm a list-lover, and the fact that I can keep track of what I usually buy, how often I'm buying certain things, AND manage my shopping list so easily is all kinds of win.  Plus, I love that the app defaults to adding things to my shopping list, unlike the Kroger website, which defaults to ClickList. Thank you for re-enforcing my already cult-like brand loyalty, Kroger. =)
recentChanges: Great news! 13.5 of the app is now available for download. We’ve added new features and enhancements to make your mobile experience even better!
• Receive push notifications for your ClickList® orders
• Print your Cart or Shopping Lists directly from the app
Plus some minor bug fixes and other great enhancements!
